sentences.english: The color-protecting techniques in Loquat fruit wine processing were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對枇杷果酒加工過程中的護色工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: Snake Bite, England. A cocktail made from cider and lager beer.
sentences.chinese: 產自英格蘭，一種用蘋果酒和大杯啤酒製成的雞尾酒。

sentences.english: He tapped off cider from a cask.
sentences.chinese: 他打開桶塞放出桶裏的蘋果酒。

sentences.english: The hot apple cider is usually spiced up with cinnamon and nutmeg.
sentences.chinese: 熱蘋果酒則通常加入肉桂和豆蔻調味。

sentences.english: As the flood clears to cider and shrinks a little.
sentences.chinese: 當潮水淨斂成蘋果酒且消縮少許。

sentences.english: The research advance of characteristic wine yeast breeding;
sentences.chinese: 對安琪果酒酵母生長特性進行了研究。

sentences.english: They tapped a barrel of cider.
sentences.chinese: 他們旋開桶塞放出蘋果酒。

sentences.english: Add apple wine in the pan and mix it with balsamic vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 最後加入蘋果酒及意大利黑醋拌勻煮香。

sentences.english: High total acids content in dry waxberry fruit wine would deteriorate wine quality.
sentences.chinese: 幹型楊梅果酒的總酸含量影響酒的質量。

sentences.english: The new clarifying technique of dried red Sea buckthorns fruit wine was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乾紅沙棘果酒澄清工藝。

sentences.english: Persimmon fruit wine was produced by single yeast strain solid fermentation with sweet persimmon as raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 以甜柿爲原料，採用酵母菌固態發酵法生產柿子果酒。

sentences.english: Learn how to make hot apple cider on the stove with tips for this traditional fall drink recipe.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何使這一傳統秋季飲方對熱爐與技巧蘋果酒。

sentences.english: He tapped off cider from a cask.
sentences.chinese: 他旋開桶塞汲取蘋果酒。

sentences.english: Deacidification on waxberry wine was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對楊梅果酒降酸技術進行了研究。

sentences.english: Aim To study the inhibition of free radicals by six kinds of apple ciders.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蘋果酒對自由基的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Heat wine bottles in the oven before bottling the homemade fruit wine.
sentences.chinese: 在烤箱裏熱酒裝瓶前瓶國產果酒。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
to ferment/to brew/to make honey (of bees)/to lead to/to form gradually/wine/stuffed vegetables (cooking method)
